title: Ace wo Nerae! (1979) (Aim for the Ace! (1979))
synopsis: High school freshman Hiromi joins the tennis club because of her admiration for Ryuzaki. Ryuzaki is a senior, who's the best tennis player on the team and also nicknamed "Ochoufujin", ("Madame Butterfly"), because of her elegance on the tennis court. However, the new coach, Jin Munakata, wants the inexperienced Hiromi to play in a forthcoming tournament.
staff: [['Dezaki, Osamu', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Fujikawa, Keisuke', ['Script', ' Screenplay']], ['Nakamura, Ryuutarou', ['Key Animation']], ['Morimoto, Kouji', ['In-Between Animation']]]
